name: Nordic Grey 3-Seater Sofa
description: A stunning Scandinavian-inspired sofa featuring clean lines and plush cushioning. The Nordic Grey Sofa combines timeless design with exceptional comfort, perfect for modern living spaces. Upholstered in premium boucl√© fabric with solid oak legs.

name: Vintage Leather Chesterfield
description: Classic British craftsmanship meets luxury in this hand-tufted Chesterfield sofa. Made from full-grain leather that develops a beautiful patina over time. Features traditional button detailing and rolled arms.

name: Minimalist White Linen Sofa
description: Pure simplicity in design. This minimalist sofa features removable linen covers for easy cleaning, making it perfect for families. Low-profile design with hidden metal legs creates a floating appearance.

name: Velvet Emerald Statement Sofa
description: Make a bold statement with this luxurious emerald velvet sofa. Art deco inspired design with channel tufting and brass-finished legs. A showstopper piece that transforms any room.

name: Solid Oak Dining Chair
description: Handcrafted from sustainable solid oak, this dining chair combines durability with elegant design. Curved backrest provides excellent lumbar support. Sold individually - perfect for mixing and matching.

name: Executive Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Premium office chair designed for all-day comfort. Features adjustable lumbar support, 4D armrests, breathable mesh back, and synchronized tilt mechanism. BIFMA certified for durability.

name: Cognac Leather Accent Chair
description: Mid-century modern accent chair in rich cognac leather. Features a solid walnut wood frame with hand-stitched leather upholstery. A timeless piece that adds warmth to any space.

name: Natural Rattan Lounge Chair
description: Bring bohemian charm to your home with this handwoven rattan lounge chair. Lightweight yet sturdy, perfect for sunrooms, patios, or reading nooks. Includes cream linen cushion.

name: Walnut Extending Dining Table
description: Elegant walnut dining table that extends from 180cm to 240cm, seating up to 10 guests. Features a butterfly leaf extension system and tapered legs. Protected with a durable matte lacquer finish.

name: Carrara Marble Coffee Table
description: Luxurious coffee table featuring a genuine Carrara marble top with distinctive grey veining. Supported by a sleek brushed brass base. Each piece is unique due to the natural stone variations.

name: Industrial Console Table
description: Raw industrial style meets refined design. Reclaimed elm wood top paired with blackened steel frame. Perfect for hallways, behind sofas, or as a home bar setup.

name: Tempered Glass Side Table
description: Minimalist side table with 12mm tempered glass top and brushed stainless steel legs. The transparent design keeps your space feeling open and airy. Set of 2.

name: Japanese Oak Platform Bed
description: Zen-inspired platform bed in solid white oak. Low-profile design with integrated nightstands. No box spring required - slat system provides excellent mattress support and ventilation. Available in King and Super King.

name: Velvet Upholstered Bed Frame
description: Hotel-luxury bed frame with deep button-tufted headboard in soft grey velvet. Solid wood frame construction with reinforced center support. Creates a stunning focal point for any bedroom.

name: Modern Four Poster Bed
description: Contemporary take on the classic four-poster bed. Clean-lined black metal frame creates architectural interest without overwhelming the space. Compatible with canopy drapes for a romantic touch.

name: Scandinavian Oak Wardrobe
description: Spacious double wardrobe in light oak with soft-close doors. Interior features adjustable shelving, full-width hanging rail, and built-in drawers. Minimalist design fits seamlessly into modern bedrooms.

name: Industrial Ladder Bookshelf
description: Five-tier ladder bookshelf combining rustic wood shelves with sturdy metal frame. Leaning design saves floor space while providing ample storage. Perfect for books, plants, and decorative objects.

name: Walnut Media Console
description: Mid-century inspired TV console in rich walnut veneer. Features slatted sliding doors that hide cables and devices, open center shelf, and integrated cable management. Supports TVs up to 75 inches.

name: Modular Cube Shelving System
description: Versatile cube storage system that you can configure to fit your space. Each module connects seamlessly. Available in white, oak, or walnut finish. Set of 6 cubes.

name: Brass Arc Floor Lamp
description: Iconic arc floor lamp in brushed brass with white linen drum shade. Adjustable arm extends up to 200cm, perfect for lighting over sofas and reading chairs. Marble base ensures stability.

name: Glass Globe Pendant Cluster
description: Statement lighting cluster featuring 5 hand-blown glass globes at varying heights. Creates beautiful ambient lighting over dining tables or in entryways. Compatible with smart bulbs.

name: Ceramic Table Lamp
description: Artisan-made ceramic table lamp with reactive glaze finish - each piece is unique. Topped with natural linen shade. Perfect bedside or accent lighting. LED bulb included.

name: Industrial Wall Sconce Pair
description: Pair of adjustable wall sconces in matte black finish with exposed Edison bulbs. Swing-arm design allows directional lighting. Hardwired or plug-in installation options. Bulbs included.

name: Modular Sectional Sofa
description: Configurable L-shaped sectional with reversible chaise. Dense foam cushions and kiln-dried hardwood frame. Choose from multiple fabric options.

name: Daybed Sofa with Trundle
description: Versatile daybed that works as sofa or guest bed. Includes pull-out trundle for extra sleeping space. Upholstered in durable linen blend.

name: Blush Velvet Two-Seater
description: Compact two-seater in sumptuous blush pink velvet. Gold-finished tapered legs. Ideal for apartments and cosy living rooms.

name: Bentwood Dining Chair Set of 4
description: Classic bentwood design with curved back and cane seat. Set of 4 chairs. Lightweight and stackable for easy storage.

name: Industrial Bar Stool Pair
description: Pair of counter-height bar stools with swivel seat and footrest. Black metal frame with wooden seat. 65cm seat height.

name: Classic Wingback Armchair
description: Timeless wingback design in charcoal grey linen. High back and winged sides offer excellent support. Solid beech frame.

name: Solid Oak Round Dining Table
description: Handcrafted round dining table in solid European oak. Seats 6 comfortably. Natural oil finish highlights the grain.

name: Live Edge Walnut Desk
description: Unique live edge walnut slab on black steel legs. Each table has distinct natural edge. Perfect as desk or dining table.

name: Oak Nesting Tables Set of 3
description: Set of three nesting side tables in light oak. Stack or separate for flexible living room layout. Matte lacquer finish.

name: Upholstered Canopy Bed
description: Romantic canopy bed with fabric-draped frame. Soft grey headboard and footboard. Creates a luxurious bedroom centrepiece.

name: Solid Wood Sleigh Bed
description: Traditional sleigh bed in warm cherry wood. Curved headboard and footboard. Available in Double, Queen and King.

name: Solid Pine Bunk Bed
description: Sturdy bunk bed in solid pine with safety rails. Ladder included. Converts to two single beds. Ideal for kids' rooms.

name: Slim Shoe Cabinet
description: Space-saving hallway shoe cabinet with 4 tiers. Holds up to 16 pairs. White finish with soft-close doors.

name: Metal Wine Rack 24-Bottle
description: Contemporary wine rack in brushed steel. Holds 24 bottles. Wall-mount or freestanding. Perfect for kitchen or dining area.

name: Tripod Floor Lamp
description: Minimalist tripod floor lamp in black metal. Adjustable shade. Perfect for reading nooks and beside sofas.

name: Crystal Chandelier
description: Elegant 6-light crystal chandelier. Clear glass droplets and polished nickel finish. Suitable for dining rooms and hallways.

name: Electric Standing Desk
description: Height-adjustable desk with memory presets. White laminate top and white frame. Supports monitors and dual setup.

name: Vintage Writing Desk
description: Compact writing desk with drawer and leather inset. Antique brass handles. Perfect for home office or bedroom.

name: Teak Garden Bench
description: Weather-resistant teak bench for garden or patio. Slatted seat and back. Develops silver patina over time. No assembly.

name: Rattan Outdoor Dining Set
description: 4-seater dining set with table and 4 chairs. Powder-coated aluminium frame with synthetic rattan. Cushions included.

name: L-Shaped Corner Sofa
description: Spacious L-shaped corner sofa in soft grey fabric. Reversible chaise and deep seats. Ideal for large living rooms.

name: Camel Leather Two-Seater
description: Compact two-seater in supple camel leather. Brass nailhead trim and turned wood legs. Timeless mid-century style.

name: Navy Velvet Sofa
description: Deep navy velvet three-seater with gold-finished legs. Plush cushions and elegant silhouette. Statement piece for modern homes.

name: Eames Style Lounge Chair
description: Iconic mid-century lounge chair with moulded plywood shell and leather cushion. Black frame with walnut armrests.

name: Tulip Dining Chair Set of 2
description: Classic tulip base dining chairs in white plastic. Set of 2. Smooth curved seat. Easy to clean and stack.

name: Solid Oak Rocking Chair
description: Handcrafted rocking chair in solid oak. Curved runners and slatted back. Perfect for nursery or porch.

name: Kitchen Bench with Backrest
description: Solid wood kitchen bench with low backrest. Seats 2. Available in oak or walnut. Fits under standard table height.

name: Slim Hallway Console
description: Narrow console table for hallways and entryways. Drawer for keys and mail. Black metal legs and oak top.

name: Bistro Table Set of 2
description: Compact bistro table with 2 stools. Perfect for small kitchens or balconies. Powder-coated steel in black.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with USB port. Dimmable and colour temperature control. Clamp or base mount.

name: Edison Bulb String Lights
description: 20-bulb string lights with vintage Edison bulbs. 10m length. Indoor or outdoor use. Creates warm ambient glow.

name: Hand-Knotted Wool Rug
description: Hand-knotted wool rug in neutral tones. 200x300cm. Adds warmth and texture to living or bedroom.

name: Natural Jute Area Rug
description: Braided jute rug in natural beige. 160x230cm. Sustainable and hardwearing. Perfect for layered look.

name: Round Wall Mirror 60cm
description: Round mirror with black metal frame. 60cm diameter. Ideal for hallway or above console. Mounting kit included.

name: Full-Length Standing Mirror
description: Freestanding full-length mirror with lean-back design. Gold metal frame. 180cm height. No wall mounting needed.

name: Ceramic Vase Set of 3
description: Set of 3 artisan ceramic vases in muted tones. Various heights. Perfect for dried or fresh flowers.

name: Wool Blend Throw Blanket
description: Soft wool blend throw in charcoal grey. 130x180cm. Adds cosiness to sofas and beds. Machine washable.

name: Children's Study Desk
description: Adjustable height kids desk with storage shelf. White finish. Grows with your child from age 4 to 12.

name: Kids Bookcase with Bins
description: Low bookcase with 4 fabric bins. Bright colours. Encourages tidying. Sturdy wood construction.

name: Dual Monitor Arm
description: Gas-spring dual monitor arm. Supports 2 screens up to 27 inch. Cable management. Clamp or grommet mount.

name: Desk Organiser Set
description: Bamboo desk organiser with pen holder, letter tray and phone stand. Keeps workspace tidy.

name: Sofa Bed Queen
description: Convertible sofa that folds into queen-size bed. Perfect for guest rooms. Grey linen upholstery.

name: Storage Ottoman
description: Large ottoman with lift-up storage. Upholstered in grey fabric. Perfect for blankets and toys.

name: Papasan Chair with Cushion
description: Rattan papasan chair with deep cushion. Relaxing bowl shape. Perfect for reading nook or balcony.

name: Oak Farmhouse Dining Table
description: Rustic farmhouse table in solid oak. Seats 8. Chunky legs and natural grain. 220cm x 100cm.

name: Oak Bedside Table Pair
description: Pair of oak bedside tables with drawer. Clean lines. 45cm width. Fits standard mattress heights.

name: Wall Murphy Bed
description: Space-saving wall bed with soft-close mechanism. Queen size. Folds flush to wall. Includes mattress.

name: Toy Storage Box Set
description: Set of 6 fabric storage boxes in assorted colours. Fits most shelving. Easy for kids to use.

name: Brass Wall Sconce
description: Single brass wall sconce with linen shade. Plug-in or hardwired. Perfect for bedside or hallway.

name: Persian Style Rug
description: Persian-inspired rug in burgundy and navy. 250x350cm. Adds luxury to living or dining room.

name: Sunburst Mirror 70cm
description: Decorative sunburst mirror in gold metal. 70cm diameter. Statement piece for above fireplace or sofa.

name: Velvet Cushion Set of 4
description: Set of 4 velvet cushions in jewel tones. 45x45cm. Inner cushions included. Mix and match with sofas.

name: Kids Wardrobe
description: Compact wardrobe with hanging rail and shelf. White finish. Soft-close doors. Ideal for children's room.

name: Mesh Back Office Chair
description: Breathable mesh office chair with lumbar support. Black frame. Height adjustable. Roller blade casters.

name: Bamboo Laptop Stand
description: Ergonomic bamboo laptop stand. Raises screen to eye level. Fits laptops up to 17 inch. Foldable.

name: Accent Side Table
description: Small accent table in brass and marble. Perfect beside armchair. 45cm diameter.

name: Floor Cushion Set of 2
description: Large floor cushions in linen. 50cm diameter. Perfect for casual seating or kids.

name: Picture Ledge Set of 2
description: Floating picture ledges in white. Display photos and art. 60cm each. Set of 2.

name: Kids Play Rug
description: Soft play rug with road map design. Non-slip backing. 140x200cm. Easy to clean.

name: Children's Wooden Chair
description: Solid wood kids chair. Natural finish. Suitable from 2 years. Wipe clean.

name: Under-Desk Keyboard Tray
description: Sliding keyboard tray. Fits under most desks. Ergonomic tilt. Black finish.

name: Leather Desk Mat
description: Genuine leather desk mat. 80x40cm. Protects desk and adds style. Natural tan.

name: Chaise Lounge
description: Elegant chaise lounge in grey fabric. One arm. Perfect for bedroom or living room.

name: Large Bean Bag
description: Giant bean bag in washable grey fabric. Filled with foam beads. Relaxing seating.

name: Rolling Tea Cart
description: Two-tier tea cart in brass and glass. Casters for easy moving. Bar or display use.

name: Upholstered Headboard
description: Queen size upholstered headboard in navy velvet. No bed frame needed. Wall mount.

name: Woven Basket Set of 3
description: Set of 3 seagrass baskets. Various sizes. Storage for toys, laundry or magazines.

name: LED Strip Lights 5m
description: RGB LED strip with remote. 5m length. Behind TV or under shelves. Adhesive backing.

name: Hallway Runner Rug
description: Narrow runner rug for hallways. 80x250cm. Grey geometric pattern. Non-slip.

name: Oval Wall Mirror
description: Oval mirror with gold frame. 70x90cm. Elegant for bedroom or bathroom.
